title: Analysis of the Interaction Between Standardization/Certification in Higher Education and Academic Freedom in [Self-Directed]

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of educational policy and basic concepts of academic freedom
context.additional_context: Analyzing the policy impact of higher education systems by practicing elementary educators, with VR simulations to experience certification case studies and strengthen self-directed learning competencies.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of standardized policies on instructional autonomy based on self-determination theory
Learners can evaluate the trade-off between academic freedom and learning quality in certified scenarios presented in VR simulations
Learners can propose actionable recommendations for improving educational policies based on research findings
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
